controllers

Class AdminHomeController

  • java.lang.Object
    • Controller
      • controllers.AdminHomeController

  • public class AdminHomeController
extends Controller
    The AdminHomeController class extends Controller class and the methods in the class are related to menu that the admin can use and the menu options call different activities that the admin can do.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AdminHomeController() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Result adminRedirect()
      adminRedirect() action method redirects to one of the pages of 'Assign Waiter', 'Rooms' or 'Room Types' depending on the button click on the Admin page.
      Result checkAdmin()
      checkAdmin() action method validates whether the user is an admin or not.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AdminHomeController

        public AdminHomeController()

    • Method Detail

      • checkAdmin

        public Result checkAdmin()
        checkAdmin() action method validates whether the user is an admin or not. If the user is an admin it redirects the admin to the page where the menu for admin operations is present.
        Parameters:
        none -
        Returns:
        AdminHome.scala.html view or NotAdmin.scala.html view depending on the success or failure to validate the admin respectively.

      • adminRedirect

        public Result adminRedirect()
                     throws java.sql.SQLException,
                            java.lang.ClassNotFoundException,
                            java.lang.IllegalAccessException,
                            java.lang.InstantiationException
        adminRedirect() action method redirects to one of the pages of 'Assign Waiter', 'Rooms' or 'Room Types' depending on the button click on the Admin page.
        Parameters:
        none -
        Returns:
        AssignWaiter.scala.html view or RoomDetails.scala.html or RoomTypesList view depending on the admin's button click.
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        java.lang.InstantiationException
